property.name: Text
property.value: You cannot redistribute food to or from this castle during the Winter Phase (you may add raided food here).

property.name: Text
property.value: After all units have been assigned in an Attack Phase but before selecting a battle to resolve, bury a random card from each army assigned to this castle, along with any cards attached to the destroyed card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer, 1 food (from this card): Bow this card. Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Food tokens on this card each absorb 2 points of damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: After a hero is assigned or moved to a battle at this castle, that her's player discards food equal to that hero's food cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: After you bow a property for gold, bow this card to produce one extra gold.

property.name: Text
property.value: After the first time each turn you bury an enemy castle, add one food token to this castle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Target a hero at the current battle. Discard the top card of your deck. If it's Fate value is higher than the hero's Glory, send that hero home. (You must have a unity present to use this ability.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Each hero without the undead keyword has a -1S/-1W while at a battle here.

property.name: Text

property.name: Text

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: Straighten your target hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: Discard this card. Discard the top card of your deck. If that card's Fate value matches your Stronghold's Fate value, search your deck for one card, put it in your hand, and shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Bury all heroes with 1S or less at the current battle. Bury all cohorts with 2S or less at the current battle. Discard this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: Look at the top card of one player's deck. Discard that card or place it back on top of that deck. If you discarded it, bow this card's hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: Target your hero. Discard the top card of your deck. If that card's Fate value equals the Fate value of the hero, give the hero a +2S/+2W marker. If not, discard that hero. Discard this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bows for 4 gold. Battle/Summer: Bow your target unbowed mine. Add +2S to your target hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bows for 3 gold. Each of your Displaced heroes gains an additional Raid +1 when raiding (but not when defending).

property.name: Text
property.value: Bows for 4 gold. If this card is unbowned when you bury one or more opposing heroes in a battle, attach a 1S Zombie Undead cohort token to one of your heroes in that battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bows for 3 gold. Increase your maximum hand size by one while you have a quest in play. Summer: Bury a target quest from your hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bows for 4 gold. Your castles have +1 Might against raids. Summer: Bows this card. Ignore the food cost of the next hero, item, property or spell card you play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Add +2S to a target attacking hero. Battle: Double the Strength of a target cohort attached to your Malchior hero. Engage that cohort. Bury that cohort after the end of the battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Target an opposing hero. That hero's player may choose to discard food tokens equal to the hero's food cost. If that player does not, bow the hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Engage your target unbowed opposed hero. Discard a card. Increase the damage by the card's Fate value. React: After an opposing hero engages but before determining immunity, discard a card. Decrease the damage of the card's Fate value.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Play after the attacker chooses a battle to resolve, but before the defender's first action. The attacker performs the first action in the current battle instead of the defender.

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer/Autumn: Add 1 food token to one of your castle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Autumn: Target a hero with one or more food tokens. Replace each of those food tokens with a -1W marker.

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: Target your unbowed hero and another player's hero with equal or lower Will. That player may choose to discard 2 food tokens. If that player does not, then that player bows his or her targeted hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Play after a tactic is played during a battle. Bury your target unbowed property. Negate all effects of the tactic.

property.name: Text
property.value: Raid: Target your defending hero. Create a battle at this castle with this raid's unit(s) assigned. Other heroes cannot move into this battle. After the battle ends, the attacker does not bow and go home. Instead, resume the raid.

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: Use one Summer ability on a target tactic in your discard pile. Bury this card. Bury that tactic.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Engage your target defending hero, and any cohorts in that unit you wish, for at least 1 damage. The attacking player cannot declare any cards immune to this damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: If, in the current battle, you have more Undead heroes in your army than the total number of heroes in the opposing army, the opposing player must bury a hero in the battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Your target cohort gains Strength equal to the Will of its hero. Engage that a cohort.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Send one target attacking unit home the current battle, bowed.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you use this card as your stealth card, play it face up and draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: Bow your target hero. Bow a target hero with a lower Glory.

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer/Autumn: Bury this card. Bury a target non-Epic property. X is equal to twice the printed gold cost of that property or 1, whichever value is greater.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Bow your target unbowed defending hero. Move 2 food tokens from the current battle's castle to your hero. (Food tokens on heroes cannot be used to absorb damage.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: Your target hero cannot be targeted by other players until your hero engaged or the Autumn Phase ends.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Send a target hero without cohorts home from the current battle. If you are the defender, you can play this at a battle where you have no units.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Play after your target hero absorbs damage from an engagement. That hero absorbs all damage from that engagement.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Move your target hero with at least 3 Will from the current battle to an unresolved battle at another castle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: Bow your target unbowed hero. Discard a card from your hand face up. Target another player. That player discards a card from his or her hand or the top of his or her deck. If your card's Fate value is higher, that player places three food tokens from his or her castles onto your hero; otherwise bury your hero.

card.name: That Which Does Not Kill Us

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: Target another player's hero. Discard the top card of that player's deck. If the card's Fate value exceeds the hero's Fate value, bury the hero; otherwise the hero gains a +2S/+2W marker.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you discard this card to absorb damage, or because of another player's card effect, draw two cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: After a quest is put into play, bow your target hero. Discard the quest unless its player bows heroes with a total Glory of 3 or more. React: Play after an opposing unit engages, but before determining immunity. Reduce the damage by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Until the end of the current battle, heroes have -3S when they engage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Battle: Your target hero gains +2S for the rest of the battle. Add a -1W marker to that hero. Engage that hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Summer: Bury this card. Discard your hand. If this is your first action this turn, draw cards up to your hand size.
